subject: Purchase heel plate and throttle only
description_text:
Is it possible to just purchase a throttle pedal and heel plate?

I am building an active brake pedal and will only need these parts.

conversations.body_text: Hi Ian Roche,    You can purchase a clutch and request to have it replaced with a throttle.  https://www.simsonn.com/products/simsonn-racing-simulator-pedal-black       heel plate: https://www.simsonn.com/products/carbon-fiber-heel-plate-1
